title.rendered: PhoneGap Application Development To Improve Customer Experience

content.rendered:
According to some statistics, it has been found that one out of every 26 unsatisfied customers raise complaints. Rests of them simply discontinue the service of the provider. And in today’s digital world, this fact can be noticed in the abandoning of the business application. Nowadays, reaching out to the customers is not the only essential aspect which a business should consider, but they should be capable of delivering the best customer experience. PhoneGap is a perfect tool for this. Let us know about PhoneGap application development to improve customer experience.

For this, a business should practice the customer-first approach. With an aim to make it effective, entrepreneurs are resorting to mobile applications in order to energize their business operations and make their workforce stay responsive to the consumers’ requirements. Top One-fourth of businesses admit doubling-up of the revenue with the practice of right solution. Getting a mobile application developed is not a tough task as there are a lot of app development frameworks and companies all across the world.

However, if businesses are looking to provide customers with an unforgettable experience, they should firstly hire an appropriate mobile app development company and this is really a task in itself. You need to take utmost care in reviewing quotations, read each terms and conditions carefully, take note of the every minute detail about the company you hire. However, you always remember to ask for a cross-platform application using PhoneGap application development framework.

A PhoneGap application assures a native and uniform digital experience to the users across varied devices. It caters to the fundamental elements of Web technologies, like CSS, HTML5, and JavaScript at the hand of a PhoneGap application developer. It also features a great store of plug-ins necessary to include platform-specific functionalities to an application. Plug-ins allows an application to make the most of the device’s features such as camera, accelerometer, compass, microphone, file system, and much more. Being an open source framework, and available under Apache Cordova, PhoneGap continues to receive updates and advanced plug-ins from its rising community members.

Other than customer experience management, PhoneGap mobile application development includes a reasonable development cost. An application developer doesn’t require creating multiple APIs for varied OS platforms. The modification or security patch of an app can be easily applied across all quickly and easily with the help of GitHub, which is a cloud-based source code management system. Startups and medium scale businesses can make the most from it as they can track their growing cost of ownership and budget without compromising with their market reach and customer experience quality. A PhoneGap powered application is compatible with every mobile operating systems ranging from iOS to Android to Windows Phone.

Therefore, considering PhoneGap application development framework means scalability and flexibility of an app is feasible, which is necessary in order to fulfill the emerging needs of a business.
